name: itinisere-map
description: A js utility to display Itinisere traffic data on an interactive map

scripts.build: node-sass src/styles -o dist/css/ && browserify src/scripts/main.js -o dist/js/itinisere-map.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] && cp -R assets dist/.
scripts.watch: node-sass -w src/styles/ -o dist/css/ & watchify src/scripts/main.js -o dist/js/itinisere-map.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -v

author: Hotentic
